title: Diamond-Studded Gold Kadas: Everyday Elegance (ಗೊಲ್ಡ್ ಕಡಾ)
features: Minimalist design featuring evenly spaced, bezel-set diamonds along the kada's circumference. The geometric design is contemporary, yet the gold finish evokes traditional South Indian aesthetics. The Kadas are designed for ease of wear, with a secure hinge closure.
occasions: office wear. Suitable as a subtle statement piece.
description: Crafted with high-quality 22K gold and brilliant-cut diamonds, these kadas offer a blend of traditional craftsmanship and modern design. The timeless design ensures they will remain a treasured part of your jewelry collection for generations. Comfortable for daily wear and a perfect gift for any occasion.
